", "replacement": " Sample_CrossLight_to_LogosAIv3_qsam.py n Objective: Collapse from 000 through superposition to 111 using Grover amplification n nimport numpy as np nfrom qiskit import QuantumCircuit, transpile nfrom qiskit_aer import AerSimulator nfrom qiskit.primitives import Sampler n nclass CollapseTriple: n def __init__ self : n self.center "JESUS CHRIST " n n def build_circuit self : n qc QuantumCircuit 3, 3 n Start at 000 , apply H for superposition n qc.h 0 n qc.h 1 n qc.h 2 n n Oracle for 111 : Toffoli Z n qc.ccx 0, 1, 2 n qc.z 2 n qc.ccx 0, 1, 2 n n Diffuser Grover-style n qc.h 0 n qc.h 1 n qc.h 2 n qc.x 0 n qc.x 1 n qc.x 2 n qc.h 2 n qc.ccx 0, 1, 2 n qc.h 2 n qc.x 0 n qc.x 1 n qc.x 2 n qc.h 0 n qc.h 1 n qc.h 2 n n qc.measure 0, 0 n qc.measure 1, 1 n qc.measure 2, 2 n return qc n n def simulate self : n print f "Testing amplified 000 111 collapse with Sampler 2.0 in the name of self.center " n circuit self.build_circuit n simulator AerSimulator n circuit transpile circuit, simulator n sampler Sampler n result sampler.run circuits circuit , shots 1024 .result n dist result.quasi_dists 0 if hasattr result, 'quasi_dists' else result 0 n n prob_111 dist.get 7, 0.0 '111' binary 7 n print "Collapse Distribution: ", dist n print f " 111 Probability: prob_111:.3f " n nif __name__ "__main__ ": n CollapseTriple .simulate "
